name: Dicelike
description:
Dicelike is a short dice building strategy game made during the GMTK Game Jam 2022 using Unity3D.  It was originally planned to have more dice building and roguelike elements, but time was short.  I might iterate on it in the future.

The dice roll automatically, and the results get queued at the bottom of the screen.  Click on tiles within the border to perform the action, either movement or attacking.  Click anywhere else to skip the action.  Defeating an enemy grants you their dice, increasing your action economy.  Snowball to defeat all the enemies and win!
